title: Album Page, "Detail and Section View of Wood Ceiling, Sacristy at St. Zeno, Verona", October 7, 1887
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, top right corner: (inscribed in circle) 67 / 78; to right of upper drawing: 8 in square; lower center: wood ceiling in Sacristy at / St Zeno / Verona Oct 7th 1887.
description: Vertical sheet showing cross section of a wooden ceiling created by a curved upper section of wall that meets flat paneling and coffers. The drawing above is a detail of the coffered ceiling, painted in shades of yellow, blue, and salmon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Detail and Section View of Wood Ceiling, Sacristy at St. Zeno, Verona", October 7, 1887.
October 7, 1887. Brush and watercolor, graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-144.
